name: Hero Horde
description:
Here as part of the GMC Game Jam [let's go green team!] 

Take on the role of a Hero on a quest do defeat a Demon Lord before time's up. Hire as many heroes as you can to defeat him, but make sure not to run out of Time or Coin!

Controls: 

Click on the Ground to move.

Click on Heroes to hire them.

Click on enemies to attack.

[Ctrl+F for full screen]

 (will be updated to support Alt+Enter fullscreening and additional changes once Jam voting is over)
